overview: It’s all happening in Pontypandy and once again Fireman Sam is called to the rescue! The twin’s day of fun turns into a terrifying experience when a wrong turn leaves their rowing boat heading for a waterfall!  It’s a hot day for Hannah and Joe when an out-of-control BBQ leaves them trapped on a cliff top and Mandy decides to give her garden a makeover. Elsewhere, the pets battle it out at a pet show and Norman is up to his old tricks again as he’s determined to win this year’s annual cheese roll competition!
title: Fireman Sam Pontypandys Finest
